infoSections.text: Unity 3D's user interface (UI) is crucial in neurotechnology for visualizing BCI data, designing neurofeedback applications, and developing immersive VR/AR environments for cognitive and motor rehabilitation. It enables researchers to create real-time dashboards, BCI control interfaces, and interactive neurorehabilitation experiences. As a powerful tool for translating complex neural data into user-friendly interactions, Unity advances both research and practical applications in neurotech.
